article_title: Should We Wallow in the Rising Stock Market?

article_metadata.author: David John Marotta

og.description: Keynesian economists have cited the rising U.S. stock market as evidence that the economy is picking up steam. Then they've been surprised by the unemployment and lack of hiring. The stock market, despite record highs, is not correlated to the performance of the overall economy. The misery index is an economic [...]
